name: Pixel Ninja Maine Coon #16
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Common Maine Coon ninja with Katana skills.

backstory.name: Whisker Runner
backstory.origin: From the frozen northern shards of the blockchain, this Maine Coon ninja grew to be one of the most formidable digital warriors. Revered for impressive size and a thick coat that shields against even the harshest network conditions.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of Master Kiyoto, Whisker Runner spent years mastering the Fire techniques, achieving the rank of Adept after passing the Trial of Attack.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Adept ninja, Whisker Runner specializes in the Attack stance while wielding a Katana, channeling the power of Fire to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Blockchain Slice - Can cut through complex smart contracts with surgical precision
Burn Trace - Leaves no transaction history behind, perfect for covert operations
